did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Order and Chaos Chez Hans Reichel 1966-1970
did.abstract: Proof file of edition published in 1966 by Loujon Press, Tucson, Arizona. Numerous notations and corrections by Miller. Includes newspaper articles and promotional broadsides, from 1966-1970, about Miller, the Loujon Press, and the Webbs.

prefercite.p: Order and Chaos Chez Hans Reichel (MS 235). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Loujon Press was started in the early 1960s by free-lance editors Jon Edgar Webb and "Gypsy" Lou Webb. The press later relocated to Tucson and Albuquerque. The Webbs designed and produced several limited edition works by Charles Bukowski and Henry Miller.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized by type of material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Proof file of edition published in 1966 by Loujon Press, Tucson, Arizona. Numerous notations and corrections by Miller. Includes newspaper articles and promotional broadsides, from 1966-1970, about Miller, the Loujon Press, and the Webbs. A copy of the large photograph of Miller from the front inside cover of the book is also present.

relatedmaterial.p: Text originally written by Henry Miller in 1937-1938 in Paris, as an unpublished book-letter to painter Hans Riechel.
